text: Gürleyik Waterfall () is a waterfall at Gürleyik village of Mihalıcçık ilçe (district) in Eskişehir Province, Turkey. A camp site and picnic area are also situated around the waterfall. The picnic area is at to the south of the village with the same name. Its distance to Mihalıcçık is and to Eskişehir is . The visitors from Ankara follow the Turkish state highway D-140 and the local road to the south. The admission fee is 10. The visitors can swim in the pond of the waterfall.Seyahat magazine ==References== Category:Landforms of Eskişehir Province Category:Mıhalıcçık District Category:Waterfalls of Turkey
title: Gürleyik Waterfall
